title: Problem while instaling 4.1.1 disk1.cab
body:
When i start to install the game this happeneds : C:\documents and settings\2016\application data\riot games\league of legends 4.1.1\install\disk1.cab has an invalid digital signature.....
Please help me how to fix this.. Answer me please

replies.body:
HI all,

sry for my bad English,

I had the same problem and I fix it.

its about your internet connection port: here are steps.

1. Go to start menu, in run(search) write cmd, than when window open write ipconfig, find your default Gateway and paste that number on your internet browser, tape your username and password if u dont know your username and password, contact your internet provider to find out.
2. Than when you open your router settings go to advance/Nat/port triggering and remove all custom ports if u have any ( I had port like 16000) and I removed it and problem with disk.cab error expired.
3. When you install the game, than if u cant log in try the solution- Open internet explorer/open tools/internet option/advance/ and scroll down and remove Use SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0 and put the correct to the use TLS 1.0 and apply/OK.

lp

I hope you understand what I wanted to say and it helps u solve the problem. Good luck!
I have the same problem.. i have disactivated antivirus too but it doesnt work

It's possible that there is some sort of OS Permissions issue that is stopping League of Legends from installing correctly.  The best step you can take is to complete all of the steps in our Permissions Guide.  I know some of the steps there may seem fairly simple, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

The problem is the same i dont fix it...but i take the game from my friend with update patch everyting on USB and i try to log on and this happend : 
The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our current Service Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com

If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article: support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Connection-Failure-Error-When-Logging-In

Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.leagueoflegends.com
Reply back to help me please!

Hmmm...it may not be a Permissions Issue afterall.  

An error in this spot is actually difficult, because it may be a certain setting with your Internet Options or it may be an actual connection issue.  Just to clarify, did you have a chance to complete all of the steps found in our [Login Issue Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944)?  This would allow us to rule out Internet Options as a possible root cause.

Reply back and let me know!
